entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Peawanuck
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:21 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -30.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peawanuck Airport 05:00 AM CST Saturday 18 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -30.7°C
Pressure: 101.0 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -43
Dewpoint: -34.1°C
Wind: NW 18 km/h gust 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 25.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 46 this morning and minus 31 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 26. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High minus 26. Wind chill near minus 42. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023
